std.value: Tom and Jerry both measured their weight before the summer holiday. It was a coincidence that their weight was almost the same. However, they had totally different lifestyles during the holiday. Jerry didn't exercise and just stayed at home, watching TV like a couch potato until midnight. Sometimes, he even stayed up playing computer games and eating a lot of junk food, while Tom lead a very healthy life. In the morning, Tom did some exercises like running or jogging in the park. In the afternoon, he did some readings with a cup of tea. At night, he went to bed early. At the end of the holiday, Tom and Jerry measured their weight again. This time, to their surprise, Jerry gained nearly 5 kilos while the weight of Tom remained basically unchanged.

std.value: Tom and Jerry both measured their weight before the summer holiday. In the school clinic, they found it interesting that their weight were both 50 kilograms. However, during the summer holiday, they spent the time leading different lifestyles. For Tom, he was addicted to TV and video games, lying on the sofa with mouthfuls of unhealthy fast food. He kept irregular hours and didn't take part in physical exercise. On the contrary, Jerry chose to lead a healthy life. In the morning, he chose to jog in the park, feeling refreshed in the beginning of the day. Also, at night, he formed the habit of reading books before sleep. Therefore, after the new semester began, they had themselves weighed again. Jerry's weight kept the same; however, to his surprise, Tom sadly said that he had gained almost 5 kilograms.

std.value: Tom and Jerry both measured their weight before the summer holiday. They were glad that their weight were the same, both 50 kilos. Then the vacation began, Tom didn't live a healthy life. He was always eating, whether when he surf the Internet at night, or when he watched TV in the day. He was so fascinated with the screen that he paid no attention to physical exercise. However, Jerry chose to lead a different lifestyle. When it was sunny outside, he kept running in the beautiful park. Also, when it was quiet at night, he cultivated the habit of reading books with a cup of hot water. Finally, when they measured their weight again after the end the summer holidays, their weights were different. Though Jerry's weight remained the same, Tom unfortunately was 5 kilograms heavier.
